node.detail_zh: 患者與父母（第 #112 及 #83 宗個案患者）同住於百福花園康福閣。患者沒有出現病徵，亦不曾到訪「福慧精舍」佛堂。患者於潛伏期內沒有外遊。與三人同住的其他家人沒有出現病徵，正接受檢疫。
node.detail_en: The patient lives in Hong Fook Court, Bedford Gardens with his parents (patients no. 112 & 83). He is asymptomatic and did not visit Fook Wai Ching She. The patient had no travel history during the incubation period. Other family members living with the three patients are all asymptomatic and are currently under quarantine.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 「福慧精舍」佛堂位於北角美輪大廈，相關患者包括佛堂工作人員及善信。「福慧精舍」是本港第三宗超級傳播事件。福群組患者中，最早病發日期是 2 月 8 日。
groups.description_en: "Fook Wai Ching She" is a Buddhist preaching hall located in Maylun Apartments, North Point. Related infected patients include staff members and followers. This is the third case of super-spreader. The case was first discovered on Feb 8.

node.remarks_zh: 與父母（第 112 及 83 宗患者）同住；未有出現病徵，在得悉母親患病後，到醫院接受檢查
node.remarks_en: The patient lives with his parents (patients no. 112 & 83) and showed no symptoms. He went to hospital after his mother (paitent no. 83) was diagnosed with coronavirus.
